name: [LD45] Where are my groceries!?
description:
Oh no, you have no groceries! Run around this bountiful world in this top-down, platforming, beat-em-up collectathon and collect everything you need.

You need to get some Bread, 3 Bottles of Milk and 6 Eggs to be a happy camper! Watch out for the dangerous Wheat and Cows!

WASD to Move

SPACE to Jump

F to Use (Health Well, Water Well and Oven)

LEFTCLICK to Punch

Q/E to Rotate Camera

SHIFT to Dash (You can dash in mid-air!)

R to reset the Player in case you get stuck

View it on the LD45 website!
